channel.title: Rusałka is Now Available
channel.description: Nick Wedig's game Rusałka is super great and I love it: https://nickwedig.itch.io/rusalka (If you want to buy it as a deck of cards, it is also available on DTRPG: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/273096/Rusalka). This is a very focused monkey's paw of a game - you will play people who really need things, and you will also play the cruel supernatural monsters who will give them precisely what they ask for.

item.title: Rusałka is Now Available
item.dc:creator: @Jmstar
item.description:
@Jmstar wrote:

Nick Wedig’s game Rusałka is super great and I love it: https://nickwedig.itch.io/rusalka (If you want to buy it as a deck of cards, it is also available on DTRPG: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/273096/Rusalka). This is a very focused monkey’s paw of a game - you will play people who really need things, and you will also play the cruel supernatural monsters who will give them precisely what they ask for.
